snippet.title: Year Walk Steam Trailer - March 6th
snippet.description:
Simogo is excited to announce the release date for the reworked edition of Year Walk. The sci-fi horror mystery of Year Walk begins via Steam on March 6th.

This new edition of Year Walk features several new additions:
• New locations within the game
• New puzzles
• Map
• Updated art
• Integrated encyclopedia about the mysterious myths and creatures encountered in the game
• Hint system
• Steam Achievement Puzzles
... and more!
